channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12268] AbstractContractAppendTest#testRenameFileBeingAppended misses rename operation.
item.description: AbstractContractAppendTest#testRenameFileBeingAppended misses rename operation. Also TestHDFSContractAppend can pass the original test after fix the issue at AbstractContractAppendTest#testRenameFileBeingAppended.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

The failure test TestDistributedFileSystem.testDFSClientPeerWriteTimeout is not related to my change. it was already reported at HDFS-8785.

Nice catch, zxu! The fix looks good to me. Two comments:
1. Would you remove unused imports in TestHDFSContractAppend and AbstractContractAppendTest?
2. Would you please fix the following javadoc comment?

/**
 * Test concat -if supported
 */
public abstract class AbstractContractAppendTest extends AbstractFSContractTestBase {

"concat" should be "append".
Thanks for the review ajisakaa! I uploaded a new patch HADOOP-12268.001.patch, which addressed all your comments. Please review it.

+1, thanks zxu. These test failures look unrelated to the patch. They were reported by HDFS-8772 and HDFS-7553.
thanks for the review ajisakaa! Will commit the patch shortly.
HADOOP-12268.001.patch has change in hdfs project. Split the patch to two changes: AbstractContractAppendTest.java for HADOOP-12268 and TestHDFSContractAppend.java for HDFS-8847.
I committed the patch to trunk and branch-2.
